title: MWE BANTU BONSE BA PANSHI
subtitle: All people that on earth do dwell
author: Unknown
tuneName: Unknown

title: Indimi Shingi Ndefwaya
author: Unknown
tuneName: O for a Thousand Tongues to Sing

title: Mutufumye No Bupalo
author: Unknown
tuneName: Lord, Dismiss Us with Thy Blessing

title: Lesa Wandi Natotela
author: Unknown
tuneName: Glory to Thee My God This Night

title: Mwe Mfumu Twaleta Bana
author: Unknown
tuneName: Our Children, Lord, in Faith and Prayer

title: Katula Aisa Kana
author: Unknown
tuneName: A Little Child the Saviour Came

title: Buleni Uwikashi
author: Unknown
tuneName: Take My Life and Let It Be

title: Mwe Tata Mubasuminishe Bemwine Pa Ntanshi Yenu
author: Unknown
tuneName: Badada, Mubazomerezge
verses: 1. Mwe tata mubasuminishe beminine pa ntanshi yenu,
Sumineni bapokeleleni, sumineni babe benu mu cine.
2. Mwe Yesu aba bantu benu, Mwafwile pa kubalubula
Benu lelo, umfweni baleti twabika Imwe mu mitima yesu.
3. Na imwe Mupashi washila, 'seni nomba mwikale nabo,
Bafweni ukwenda bwino, umutende wisule mu mitima yabo,
4. Bacite milimo isuma, bapeleni bonse amaka,
'Kuti bende mubulungami basuke bafike kuli 'mwe ku mulu,
5. Mwe tata mutashiwe, na Imwe Yesu, Mulubushi wesu,
Na imwe Mupashi mu basangulule Lesa umo fye acindikwe.

title: Ni Kuno Twamonana, Mwe Mfumu
author: Unknown
tuneName: Here, O my Lord, I see Thee face to face
verses: Kanwe na Imwe waini wa mulu;
3. E nshita ya kulyo no kulumba;
Ne mwe, mu nshite yi yawamisha
Shintu tukaba na sho kwa Yesu.

title: Nshawamina, Mwe Mfumu Yandi
author: Unknown
tuneName: I am not worthy

title: Kristu e Watulubula
author: Unknown
tuneName: By Christ redeemed

title: Ku Cintamba ca Mfumu
author: Unknown
tuneName: Jesus to Thy table

title: Sumbuleni Imitwe Mwe
author: Unknown
tuneName: Lift up your heads, ye gates

title: Ni Katula, Pa Mfwa Yakwe
author: Unknown
verses: Ni katula, pa mfwa yakwe, abulile umukate ati,
Mwe buleni, mwe buleni umukate, umukate, mulye
E mulopa, e mulopa wasumine, wasumine imwe.
Imfwa yandi, imfwa yandi, ndemufwila, ndemufwila, bonse

title: Yesu Ni Ntulo Ya Nsansa
author: Unknown
verses: Mwe Lesa mube ne fwe pe,

title: APO NDEILINGULULA 'NDI MUBEMBU
author: Unknown
verses: Ine na maka yandi yeka yeka ndefilwa,
Pa kutuma Yesu abe cilubula candi.
Ingu mfwe ukutemwa kwena cine ndepola,
Pantu wen ni Mpalume ya bantu nse bonse
Nomba fwe bonse ilyo tucili pano;
Twibukishe mfwa yakwe no kubushiwa kwa kwe,
Ukunina kwa kwe, mpaka akasuke esa.
Kasuba ka kwe wenw na bangeli,
Pantu ako kasuba ka kwe ka kupingula.

title: MWE LUSE LUTUNTULU NO LWA BUPE
author: Unknown
verses: Mwe Luse lutuntulu no lwa bupe,
Ku mweo, ku mfwa kwine, bafwane.

title: SHINGANGA ALI MUPEPI
author: Unknown
tuneName: The Great Physician

title: TULUMBANISHA MAKA YE
author: Unknown
tuneName: All hail the power of Jesu's Name

title: NDEFWAYA IMWE PE
author: Unknown
tuneName: I need Thee

title: CINTU CAKUTUSUNGUSHA
author: Unknown
tuneName: It is a thing most wonderful

title: SEKELELENI! KALUBULA 'ISA
author: Unknown
tuneName: Rejoice and be glad! The Redeemer has come

title: ISHIWI NDEUMFWA
author: Unknown
tuneName: I hear Thy welcome voice

title: MWE UMFWENI IMBIA NSUMA
author: Unknown
tuneName: What did He do?
verses: Ni kwi aya? Ni ku mulu!

title: BONSE NATULUMBE LESU WESU
author: Unknown
tuneName: Saviour, like a shepherd lead us

title: MWE KATULA MWINCILILA
author: Unknown
tuneName: Pass me not, O gentle Saviour

title: NOMBO KWISHIBA NAISHIBA
author: Unknown
tuneName: Blessed assurance, Jesus is mine
verses: Amfumya mu mfifi, na ku mfwa;

title: ONSE UTEMENWE! BOMFWE BONSE
author: Unknown
tuneName: Whosoever will
verses: Bileni monse mu mpili ne nika;
Ne nshila ya mweo yene yabako:

title: MWISE KWA YESU, MWIKOKOLA
author: Unknown
tuneName: Come to the saviour, make no delay

title: LUMBANYENI YESU UWATUUBULA
author: Unknown
tuneName: Praise Him, Praise Him
verses: Celeleni Yesu, mwe bali mu mulu,
Mwimbileni no lwimbo pe na pe.
Mwimbileni ni lwimbo pe na pe.
Mwimbileni no lwimbo pe na pe.

title: KULYU BWITE BULEFUMA KWI SHILYA
author: Unknown
tuneName: There's a call comes
verses: Icikuku ca kwa Yesu cice pe

title: TANDE NSHIKU SHONSE MBUTO SHA BUSUMA
author: Unknown
tuneName: Sowing in the morning, sowing seeds of kindness
verses: Tande nshiku shonse mbuto sha busuma,
Tanda ku lucelo, na po kawa fwe;
Nga twaya tukasamwa pe, tukasamwa pe.
Tanda ku kasuba na ku cintelelwe,
Kanshi fwe balila, kanshi fwe banaka,

title: NA LIMBI 'IYO WE MUTIMA WANDI
author: Unknown
tuneName: Once more my soul
verses: Na limbi iyo we mutima wandi,

title: KATULA UMO WINE
author: Unknown
tuneName: One offer of salvation to all the world

title: BWELA WE WALUBA, WE WANAKA
author: Unknown
verses: Akupelyo umweo wa pe na pe.

title: NATOTLWE LESA, WA MAKA YONSE
author: Unknown
verses: Isa kuli Lesa mu Mwana wakwe,
Na ifwe twalyanga mu Mwana wakwe;

title: ILINTU MUTENDE ULEYA NA INE
verses: Satana nga ntunka, ngo kwisa kweshiwa,
Te kuti ntine; mu mfwa nga mu mweo,
E kwisa kwenu ndepembela, mwe Mfumu,

title: NDI WENU MFUMU, NALYUMFWA SHIWI
verses: Na ine nsoshanya ne mwe Lesa,

title: YESU NAMUTEMWA SHIKULU WANDI
verses: Katula wa luse, nkamwimbila fye pe,
E imwe mwalinga, e imwe mwalinga,
E imwe mwalinga, e imwe mwalinga,
No Kwimba ningemba ne mfwa pa mpumi,
Na benu banino kuba nr mwe pe,
E imwe mwalinga, e imwe mwalinga,

title: PEPENI LESA MU MUSHILO WAYEMBA
verses: Aleafwa no kubaka ku sha nkali,

title: MWE CENGE CA LUSE, NTUNGULUSHI
verses: Mwe Lesa, Ye! labeni sha kale.

title: MWISE NJAFWA, LESA M'KULU
verses: Pa kufika ku m'longa wa mfwa,

title: NE SESE NE PENGA 'BENGI BALIKO
subtitle: With harps and with viols
verses: Na mu cinso ca Mfumu baimbo lwimbo:
Twali fye mu mfifi, twali abasha,

title: WE MULENDO ULEYS KWI?
verses: Ni few bantu bene Yesu! Lindilila!

title: MU BULANDA BONSE UBO USANGA
subtitle: “When upon life’s billows”
verses: Pende fya bupe bwa kwa Lesa
Losha menso kuli Kristu ku ntashi
Ne fya ku mwabo uleo atangila

title: MWE MFUMU NYENDE NA IMWE
subtitle: “O Master, let me walk with Thee”

title: MWE MFUMU NYENDE NA IMWE
subtitle: “O Master, let me walk with Thee”

title: KU MINWE LESA NJIKATA
subtitle: “He leadeth me, O blessed thought”
verses: Mwe Tata, nyende pe ne mwe,

title: PA BUSUMA BWA CALO
subtitle: For the beauty of the earth

title: YESU ALETWITA BONSE
subtitle: Yesus calls us o’er the tumult

title: ESHA PE, USHILE, UMFWE KU MFUMU
subtitle: Take time to be Holy.
verses: Esha pe, ushile, Umfwe ku Mfumu;
Fwaye palo lyakwe, Ne cebo baka.
Wende nankwe pamo, Wiya pa natanshi:
E was ale nshila, E mweo wesu.
Enda no Mupashi, poke fya bupe,
E fyo uwaminwe, ku mweo w ape.

title: TE KUTI NKANE YESU YO
subtitle: “I’m not ashamed to own my Lord”
verses: Pa muti, pa muti yashibulwa menso,

title: TULIMA NO KUTANDA
subtitle: We plough the fields and scatter

title: YEMWE, TUYEMFYA BANE
verses: Tulesefyo bwinga bwa Mwana wa Mpanga
E shibwings wesu Mwana wa kwa Lesa,
Ilambo lya cine e mitima yesu,
E kutemwe kwesu kuli Tata wesu,
Twaipela kuli mwe tuli bantu benu.
Pa fifwalo fyesu, na pa filyo fyonse.
Na pa busuma bwa maluba yonse,
E ni Mfuma yesu, akateke calo,
Mwe fibumbwa fyonse fya mu calo conse.

title: YESU UWALI MU MULU
verses: Ku mulu ni ku kwisa fwa;
